>>Which two components can be connected with a slicer?<<
[ ] Named range [x] Pivot table [ ] Excel chart [x] Pivot chart
[explanation] While an Excel table can be filtered using a slicer, a slicer can be connected to either pivot table or pivot chart. [explanation]
